content.text:
# 1991 Pilkington Glass Championships – Singles

Martina Navratilova
| runner   =  Arantxa Sánchez Vicario
| score    = 6–4, 6–4
| type     = singles doubles
| main_name = Eastbourne International
| draw     = 64 (8/3)
| seeds    = 16
}}
Martina Navratilova won her fourth consecutive title, and her tenth overall title at Eastbourne, by defeating Arantxa Sánchez Vicario 6–4, 6–4 in the final.
Seeds
Martina Navratilova (champion)
#  Arantxa Sánchez Vicario (final)
#  Mary Joe Fernández (semifinals)
#  Jana Novotná (quarterfinals)
#  Zina Garrison (withdrew)
#  Helena Suková (second round)
#  Nathalie Tauziat (second round)
#  Amy Frazier (first round)
#  Anne Smith (withdrew)
#  Helen Kelesi (third round)
#  Lori McNeil (third round)
#  Rachel McQuillan (second round)
#  Julie Halard (third round)
#  Marianne Werdel (first round)
#  Rosalyn Fairbank-Nideffer (third round)
#  Gretchen Magers (second round)
}}
